page.title: 11RECREATION IN CHINGFORD
page.content: Our class conducted some surveys to find out what people living in Ching- ford do in their spare time.To find out we took letters home to our families.They had to tick off the activities that they did in their spare time.We made big graphs so everyone could see them.Here are a few things we found they took part in; Racket games, {11 people } Outdoor sports, {6 people} Keep fit, {13 people } Water sports, {12 people Walthamstow Stadium(dog track), {1 Walks in Epping Forest,{16 people Local museums, {8 people Historic buildings, {10 people Seaside resorts, {17 people Holidays at home, {7 people Most people said they liked living in Chingford.Picketts Lock,a local sports centre was very popular.
